name: Solo
storyline:
Eight thirty in the morning: Carlitos starts his hard day: breakfast, washing his ears, going to school..., but that's not the worst of it.

The way to school is full of dangers, gigantic and voracious rats, thugs, and a whole fauna of urban beings stalk the children on their way to school, how hard life is!

Crestfallen, fearful, Carlitos walks through the dark streets of the neighborhood on a frosty morning. Any shadow frightens him, unexpectedly he finds himself surrounded by enemies. Poor Carlitos, NO!!!!
summary: Solo is another game created by Opera soft for exclusive use with the optical gun "Gun Stick"
